document_data.mainbody:
A scroll of protection from fire was an enchanted scroll that offered protection from fire.
After reading this scroll a  sphere of protection was centered on the reader. The sphere protected anyone inside from all forms of magical and nonmagical fire. The sphere lasted for 50â€“90 minutes.
Usamah, a corsair sailing the Great Sea near Zakhara, carried a scroll of protection from fire.
